Unrest has gripped Thailand for roughly six months , sparked by public outrage over corruption allegations against the country 's former prime minister , Yingluck Shinawatra .
Critics accused her of acting as a proxy for her exiled brother , former Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra .
